## SemaphoreOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/semaphore.ts" sourceLine="49" packageName="commandkit" />

Configuration options for semaphore

```ts title="Signature"
interface SemaphoreOptions {
    permits?: number;
    timeout?: number;
    storage?: SemaphoreStorage;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### permits

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

Maximum number of concurrent permits allowed. Default: 1
### timeout

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

Default timeout in milliseconds for permit acquisition. Default: 30000
### storage

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/semaphore-storage#semaphorestorage'>SemaphoreStorage</a>`}   />

Storage implementation for persisting semaphore data. Default: <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/classes/memory-semaphore-storage#memorysemaphorestorage'>MemorySemaphoreStorage</a>


</div>
